import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import './CartPage.css'; const productPage = (productID) => { window.location.href = `/product/${productID}`; }; const CartPage = ({ cart }) => { const grandTotal = cart.reduce((acc, product) => acc + product.price * product.quantity, 0); return (

Items in cart

{cart.map((product) => ( ))}
Product Photo Product Name Quantity Total
{product.productName} Qty: Total: ${product.price * (product.quantity || 1)}
Grand Total: ${grandTotal}
); } export default CartPage;
